general_advisory: In Rice crop, if Zinc sulphate (ZnSO4) has not been applied during final land preparation, then Zn-EDTA @ 0.5 g/liter of water can be applied at 30 and 45 days after transplanting. Sheds of cattle and goats are made clean and provide fresh feeds and water.

advisory: The rest amount of fertilizer (nitrogen and phosphorus) that was not applied during basal should be applied in split dose now.
The caterpillar eats the pod and rots it.
To control this, apply Flubendiamide 20%WG @150gram/ha along with 500lt of water.
Blast disease may occur due to alternate drying and wetting condition.
Spray Hexaconazole or Tricyclazole@0.7gram/liter at 15 days interval regularly.
To control fall army worm, 10-12 bird perches can be used per acre and removed before tasselling so that the birds do not eat the cobs.
Spray Emamectin Benzoate 5 % S.G @ 80 -gram/acre or Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% S.C @ 80-ml/acre by mixing in 200-litre of water.
To manage stem weevil in banana crop, install pheromone traps @ 10/acre.
Dip the banana stem in warm water for 30 minutes before planting.
Sanitize the field and remove the infected plants.
Cattle should be dewormed at regular time interval and vaccinated properly.
Clean the water before releasing the fishes.
Apply lime 5-10kg/ha according to the size of the pond.
